page.title: 03CLUBS - NORTH TAWTON
page.content: {North Tawton Rugby club}will celebrate 100 years of Rugby played in North Tawton this year, as the first junior club to do so in the country.In the past they have held the Devon Junior Cup twice and have had several players capped for Devon.For the last five years they have been able to run out two teams of players each weekend. As a small town people enjoy their sports.There is a{cricket club}also celebrating 100 years of cricket. The other sports also played are {Football, Mens/Ladies Bowls, Badminton in the local Town Hall,{Tennis}played at the local Primary School: for the less energetic there is also the {Fishing Club}and{Darts}and{Pool}played in all the local Pubs.
